title: Get setup with Google Cloud command lines

commands.gcloud init: Initialize, authorize, and configure the gcloud tool.
commands.gcloud components update: Update Google Cloud CLI to the latest version.
commands.gcloud config set project: Set a default Google Cloud project.
commands.gcloud info: Display current gcloud tool environment details.

title: Google Cloud CLI is happy to help

commands.gcloud help: Search reference documents for specific terms.
commands.gcloud feedback: Provide feedback to the Google Cloud CLI team.
commands.gcloud --help: Display general help for gcloud CLI.
commands.gcloud <command> --help: Get help for a specific command.

commands.gcloud config get: Fetch the value of a property.
commands.gcloud config list: Display all properties of the current config.
commands.gcloud config configurations describe: Show details of a specific config.

title: Manage billing for your Google Cloud account

commands.gcloud billing projects link: Link a project to a billing account.
commands.gcloud billing accounts describe: Show details of a billing account.

title: Grant and revoke authorization to Google Cloud CLI

commands.gcloud auth login: Authorize Google Cloud access for the gcloud tool with Google user credentials and set current account as active.
commands.gcloud auth activate-service-account: Like gcloud auth login but with service account credentials.
commands.gcloud auth print-access-token: Display the current account's access token.
commands.gcloud auth revoke: Remove access credentials for an account.
commands.gcloud auth application-default login: Authorize Google Cloud access for Application Default Credentials (ADC) with Google user credentials.
commands.gcloud auth application-default logout: Revoke the authorization for Application Default Credentials (ADC).
commands.gcloud auth application-default print-ac: Display the access token for Application Default Credentials (ADC).
commands.gcloud auth application-default print-id: Display the identity token for Application Default Credentials (ADC).
commands.gcloud auth configure-docker: Configure Docker to use Google Cloud credentials for authentication and authorization when pushing or pulling container images.

commands.gcloud projects describe: Display metadata for a project (including its ID).
commands.gcloud projects add-iam-policy-binding: Add an IAM policy binding toa specified project.
commands.gcloud projects list: List projects in the authenticated user's account.
commands.gcloud projects get-iam-policy: Get the IAM policy for a project.
commands.gcloud projects set-iam-policy: Set the IAM policy for a project.
commands.gcloud projects remove-iam-policy-bindin: Remove an IAM policy binding from a project.
commands.gcloud projects get-ancestors: Get the ancestors of a project.
commands.gcloud projects set-default: Set the default project for the gcloud command-line tool.
commands.gcloud projects move: Move a project to a different folder or organization.
commands.gcloud projects enable: Enable a service on a project.
commands.gcloud projects disable: Disable a service on a project.

commands.gcloud iam list-grantable-roles: List IAM grantable roles for a resource.
commands.gcloud iam roles create: Create a custom role for a project or org.
commands.gcloud iam service-accounts create: Create a service account for a project.
commands.gcloud iam service-accounts add-iam-poli: Add an IAM policy binding to a service account.
commands.gcloud organizations list: List organizations associated with the authenticated user.
commands.gcloud projects list: List projects in the authenticated user's account.
commands.gcloud projects describe: Display information about a specific project.
commands.gcloud projects set-iam-policy: Set the IAM policy for a project.
commands.gcloud projects add-iam-policy-binding: Add an IAM policy binding to a project.
commands.gcloud projects remove-iam-policy-bindin: Remove an IAM policy binding from a project.
commands.gcloud organizations get-iam-policy: Get the IAM policy for an organization.
commands.gcloud organizations set-iam-policy: Set the IAM policy for an organization.
commands.gcloud organizations add-iam-policy-bind: Add an IAM policy binding to an organization.
commands.gcloud organizations remove-iam-policy-b: Remove an IAM policy binding from an organization.

commands.gcloud auth configure-docker: Register the gcloud tool as a Docker credential helper.
commands.gcloud container clusters create: Create a cluster to run GKE containers.
commands.gcloud container clusters list: List clusters for running GKE containers.
commands.gcloud container clusters get-credential: Update kubeconfig to get kubectl to use a GKE cluster.
commands.gcloud container images list-tags: List tag and digest metadata for a container image.
commands.gcloud container clusters resize: Resize the node pool of a GKE cluster.
commands.gcloud container clusters describe: Display details of a GKE cluster.
commands.gcloud container clusters update: Update the properties of a GKE cluster.
commands.gcloud container node-pools list: List node pools in a GKE cluster.
commands.gcloud container node-pools create: Create a node pool in a GKE cluster.
commands.gcloud container node-pools delete: Delete a node pool from a GKE cluster.
commands.gcloud container node-pools update: Update the properties of a node pool in a GKE cluster.
commands.kubectl get pods: List pods in a Kubernetes cluster.
commands.kubectl describe pod: Display details of a specific pod in a Kubernetes cluster.
commands.kubectl logs: Retrieve logs from a pod in a Kubernetes cluster.
commands.kubectl exec: Execute a command in a running container within a pod.
commands.kubectl apply: Apply a configuration to a Kubernetes cluster.
commands.kubectl delete: Delete resources from a Kubernetes cluster.

title: Create, run, and manage VMs on Google infrastructure

commands.gcloud compute instances list: List all VM instances in a project.
commands.gcloud compute ssh: Connect to a VM instance by using SSH.
commands.gcloud compute instances set-machine-typ: Change the machine type of a VM instance.
commands.gcloud compute instances add-metadata: Add metadata to a VM instance.
commands.gcloud compute instances get-serial-port: Retrieve serial port output of a VM instance.
commands.gcloud compute firewall-rules list: List firewall rules in a project.
commands.gcloud compute instances create INSTANCE: Create a new VM instance that will not be automatically deleted.

title: Build highly scalable applications on a fully managed serverless platform

commands.gcloud app deploy: Deploy your app's code and configuration to the App Engine server.
commands.gcloud app versions list: List all versions of all services deployed to the App Engine server.
commands.gcloud app browse: Open the current app in a web browser.
commands.gcloud app create: Create an App Engine app within your current project.
commands.gcloud app logs read: Display the latest App Engine app logs.
commands.gcloud app services list: List all services within an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app services update: Update the configuration of a service within an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app services delete: Delete a service within an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app versions describe: Display details of a specific version of a service in an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app versions delete: Delete a specific version of a service in an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app traffic split: Split traffic between multiple versions of a service in an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app domain-mappings list: List domain mappings for an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app domain-mappings create: Create a new domain mapping for an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app domain-mappings delete: Delete a domain mapping from an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app firewall-rules list: List firewall rules for an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app firewall-rules create: Create a new firewall rule for an App Engine app.
commands.gcloud app firewall-rules delete: Delete a firewall rule from an App Engine app.

title: Commands that might come in handy

commands.gcloud kms decrypt: Decrypt ciphertext (to a plaintext file) using aCloud Key Management Service (Cloud KMS) key.
commands.gcloud sql backups describe: Display info about a Cloud SQL instance backup.
commands.gcloud sql export sql: Export data from a Cloud SQL instance to a SQL file.
commands.gcloud source repos list: List source code repositories in Cloud Source Repositories.
commands.gcloud source repos clone: Clone a source code repository from Cloud Source Repositories.
commands.gcloud source repos create: Create a new source code repository in Cloud Source Repositories.
commands.gcloud source repos delete: Delete a source code repository from Cloud Source Repositories.
commands.gcloud pubsub topics create: Create a new topic in Cloud Pub/Sub.
commands.gcloud pubsub topics delete: Delete a topic from Cloud Pub/Sub.
commands.gcloud pubsub subscriptions create: Create a new subscription in Cloud Pub/Sub.
commands.gcloud pubsub subscriptions delete: Delete a subscription from Cloud Pub/Sub.
